1.12.2.1.0.0: Time for a full release then boys

1.12.2.1.2.0: Fixes, see github/curseforge for the full changelog
1.12.2.1.2.1: Open to LAN fix & update checker no longer reports out of date version
1.12.2.1.2.2: Fixed killing other players by regeneration
1.12.2.beta-v1.3-cd7386a: Rewritten back-end, should be stable but it's not feature complete
1.12.2.beta-v1.3-af55921: Bugfixes from the last beta, see github/curseforge for full list
1.12.2.1.2.3: Fixed loot tables and other minor issues. See github/curseforge for more details
1.12.2.beta-v1.3-29c2dd3: New healing system & fixed loot tables
1.12.2.1.2.4: The loot table actually works now
1.12.2.1.2.5: Fixes a exploit in the fob watch
1.12.2.1.3.4: A release of new changes! Read Curse Forge Desc for more info!
1.12.2.1.3.5: Skin Changing! See curse for details: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/regeneration/files/2661867
1.12.2.1.3.6: Fixed crashes & bugs, improved LucraftCore integration and a new config layout
